noun.description: A supporter of Zionism; a person who believes in the development and protection of a Jewish nation in what is now Israel.
examples: the artist's parents were committed Zionists

noun.description: (in southern Africa) a member of any of a group of independent Churches which practice a form of Christianity incorporating elements of traditional African beliefs.

adjective.description: Relating to a group of independent Churches in southern Africa which practice a form of Christianity incorporating elements of traditional African beliefs.
